mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{pwQuestion}, #{pwAnswer}, null, now(), now(), 0, "ROLL_USER" );
mapper.select: select count(username) from user_mst where username = #{username};
select password from user_mst where username = #{username};
mapper.update: update user_mst set name = #{name}, pw_question = #{pwQuestion}, pw_answer = #{pwAnswer}, image_type = #{imgType}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
update user_mst set name = #{name}, pw_question = #{pwQuestion}, pw_answer = #{pwAnswer}, image_type = null, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
update user_mst set password = #{password}, update_date = now() where id = #{id};
